description: The renal team provides diagnostic and treatment service for people with disease affecting kidney including ultrasonography guided real time kidney biopsy, central venous dialysis catheter placement. The Vigor Kidney and Dialysis Centre comprise a 3-beded hemodialysis unit specially designed for children, pediatric ward and full time outpatient clinic (OPD).
